title: Chapter 7 – Practice: Numbers, Math Library, and Randomness
description: Hands-on missions for chapter 7 using exponents, the math module, rounding helpers, and random numbers for tiny console simulations.

practices.title: Mission: Super Calculator – Powers and Roots

solution.notes: Learner should import math, read a positive number from input, and print its square, cube, and square root in clear sentences using ** and math.sqrt.

practices.title: Mission: Rounding Gym – Round, Floor, and Ceil

solution.notes: Learner should import math, read a decimal number, and print the rounded, floored, and ceiled versions using round, math.floor, and math.ceil.

practices.title: Mission: Dice Roller – Sum of Many Rolls

solution.notes: Learner should import random, ask how many times to roll, use random.randint(1, 6) in a loop, and print each roll plus a final total sum.

practices.title: Mission: Guess the Number – Distance Hint

solution.notes: Learner should import random, pick a secret number with random.randint(1, 50), loop asking for guesses until correct, and after wrong guesses print whether it is too high/low and how far away using abs(secret - guess).
